pkgmetadata.longdescription: Bandwidth Selector with Penalized Comparison to Overfitting Criterion // Bandwidth selector according to the Penalised Comparison to Overfitting (P.C.O.) criterion as described in Varet, S., Lacour, C., Massart, P., Rivoirard, V., (2019) https://hal.archives-ouvertes.fr/hal-02002275. It can be used with univariate and multivariate data.
